alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 9:18PM EDT until June 17 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Irwin County in south central Georgia... Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 918 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Abbeville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Lulaville, Osierfield, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Wray, Bowens Mill, Red Bluff, Ashton, Arp, Abba and Queensland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
